root.name: Karaoke Revolution Presents American Idol Encore 2
root.description: Track ListImagine by John Lennon Since U Been Gone by Kelly Clarkson Don't Stop Till You Get Enough by Michael Jackson 867-5309 JENNY by Tommy Tutone My Happy Ending by Avril Lavigne Stayin' Alive by Bee Gees Speed of Sound by Coldplay It's Not Over by Daughtry Wait For You by Elliot Yamin Rocket Man by Elton John The Sweet Escape by Gwen Stefani That's The Way (I Like It) by KC The Sunshine Band Apologize by One Republic / Timbaland Hey There Delilah by Plain White T's Paint It Black by Rolling Stones If It Makes You Happy by Sheryl Crow Wannabe by Spice Girls I'm Every Woman by Whitney Houston Livin' on a Prayer by Bon Jovi Islands In The Stream by Dolly Parton Kenny Rogers Big Girls Don't Cry (Personal) by Fergie Just The Two Of Us by Grover Washington Jr. Bill Withers Mr. Brightside by Killers I'm Like a Bird by Nelly Furtado Who Knew by Pink Life is a Highway by Rascal Flatts Maggie May by Rod Stewart Pinball Wizard by The Who Enjoy the Silence by Depeche Mode Over My Head (Cable Car) by Fray Vacation by Go-Gos Maneater by Hall Oates Don't Know Much by Linda Ronstadt Aaron Neville Losing My Religion by R.E.M. Eye of the Tiger by Survivor YMCA by Village People Seven Nation Army by White Stripes Dance Like There Is No Tomorrow by Paula Abdul Take Me Out by Franz Ferdinand Crazy In Love by Beyonce
